pci.description: Physical Cell ID. Range 0 to 1007. Equal to ORS Serial number modulo 1008 by default

nr_band.description: NR band number. Default depends on ORS model, please refer to the connection parameters

dl_frequency.title: DL Frequency
dl_frequency.description: Downlink center frequency of the cell. Default depends on your ORS model, please refer to the connection parameters. Make sure to not set a value outside the range of your ORS

dl_nr_arfcn.title: Expert: DL NR ARFCN
dl_nr_arfcn.description: Can be used instead of DL Frequency to directly set the Downlink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell (Do not set both DL Frequency and DL NR ARFCN)

root_sequence_index.title: Expert: Root Sequence Index
root_sequence_index.description: Range: 0 to 137. Equal to ORS serial number modulo 138 by default. Sets prach-RootSequenceIndex parameter. It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.
